description: a(n)=(1/2)*Sum{|d(i)-e(i)|} where Sum{d(i)*6^i) is the base 6 representation of n and e(i) are the digits d(i) in nondecreasing order.
maple: A037883 := proc(n)    local a,dgs,dgsE ;    a := 0 ;    dgs := convert(n,base,6);    dgsE := sort(dgs) ;    for i from 1 to nops(dgs) do        a := a+ abs(op(i,dgs)-op(i,dgsE)) ;    end do:    a/2 ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 19 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Definition swapped with A037874. - _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 19 2015
